Title: Special Relationship
Writer: Simon Blackwell (teleplay), Tony Roche (teleplay), Simon Blackwell (story), Armando Iannucci (story), Tony Roche (story), Armando Iannucci (created by)
Actors: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Anna Chlumsky, Tony Hale, Reid Scott
Plot: Crossover episode with Armando Iannucci previous political sitcom the Thick of It.
